import React, { Component } from 'react'; import ReactTooltip from 'react-tooltip'; import api from '../../../../services/api' class OrderList extends Component{ state = { orders: [], users: [], contagem: '' } async componentDidMount() { const res = await api.get('/auth/users') const response = await api.get('/auth/order') console.log(response.data) if(response) { this.setState({ orders: response.data }) this.setState({ users: res.data }) } } formataPreco = preco => { return new Intl.NumberFormat('en-IN', { maximumSignificantDigits: 3 }).format(preco); } render() { const { users, orders } = this.state; return(
